text: Motion
Let's see...
...there it is! Nice...!
Motion
Motion
Hmmm...
Hah...
Yuika
(The previous issue should be around here still, right?)
(...It's on the top shelf, huh? Now that's high up.)
(There's no stool... But maybe I'm tall enough...?)
Motion
(Nnn~ ~ ! ...It's too high up! I knew I should've got──)
It's this magazine, right?
Huh?!
(Producer!?)

( ! ! !  Where did you come from?! At least tell me that
you're coming in──!)
──Here you go.
R-Right, thanks...!

Don't force yourself like that again, okay? Use a platform
next time. I don't want you getting hurt.
R-Right...!

And... Sorry about that.
Did I surprise you?
Huh?
Well, did I?

Ah-ha! What's with that smile!?
Don't tell me, you did this on purpose?!
Hahaha! Your reaction was priceless!

You were concentrating so hard, so wouldn't
have noticed me at all.

I can't believe I managed to sneak up on you
from behind like that!

Ugh! I don't like that one bit!
That's naughty coming from you, Producer!

Was it really?
Is it naughty when I lent you a hand?

D-Damn you...!
You have an excuse for everything...!

You're the one who usually throws me off a loop,
so it was felt nice to flip the script for a change.

I'm going to remember this~
Mitsumine is so gonna have her revenge!
Ooo scary. I best watch my back, then.
Yuika and Producer
So what's got you so fixated back here?

Oh right! It's a magazine where I'll be having my
photoshoot. Mitsumine never read it before.
So I'm conducting some research~

I see...
So you're getting a feel for it.

I'm just reading enough so I won't end up saying stuff
about it like a total ignoramus.

That's more than enough. If you can say that, then
I'm sure you've been doing more than what's asked for.
Wow, pressure!

Not pressure, I'd rather call it faith.
...that being said...

If anything comes up during the shoot, you can
count on me. It's what I'm here for.
Motion
